      • Phid4P5

    • Method Detail

      • phSetup

        public void phSetup(int ser)

      • closePh

        public void closePh()
        Closes the phidget, if attached. Called automatically.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        closes everything. called automatically when the application is closed.

      • printSer

        public void printSer()
        if any number of phidgets need to be connected at the same time, connect each one of them in turn, and run the "printSer" function to get specified IDs. Then use this ID number when initializing the boards. See example Connect_Multiple

      • getSer

        public int getSer()
        When using events, it might be helpful to know which Phidget board initiated the event. You can use "printSer" to print a serial number of a specific board, and then, inside the event, check if the calling board has the same serial number using "getSer".

      • version

        public static String version()
        return the version of the Library.
        Returns:
        String
